sense.gloss: children's hairstyle of short untied hair, child with short untied hair
young girl working as a servant for a high-class prostitute (Edo period)
small child, pipsqueak, small fry, small, cute versions of manga, anime, etc. characters, typically with oversized heads
to lose hair, to become bald
to become bare (e.g. a mountain becomes bare of trees)
to become bald from the forehead, to recede (of one's hairline)
bald mountain, denuded mountain, bare hill, treeless hill

sdata.j: あんまり↑心配↑↓しんぱい↓すると↑禿↑↓は↓げるよ。
sdata.e: Don't worry too much, or you'll go bald.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は、↑若↑↓わか↓いうちに↑禿↑↓は↓げたくない。
sdata.e: I don't want to go bald when I'm still young.

sdata.j: むしろロン↑毛↑↓げ↓のほうが↑禿↑↓は↓げやすいって↑聞↑↓き↓いたぞ。
sdata.e: In fact, I've heard that long hair is more likely to go bald!
